attributes.action: Ensure all Government cars have an engine capacity of less than one litre.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time for Governments to lead by example in the war against climate change.
I believe that they should be using public transport for the majority of journeys and if timetables are not suitable then they should travel in more economical cars than the Jaguars and Range Rovers that they are currently using.
